title: AssetDump v2 Script Metadata Facts
description: Per-MonoScript fact rows capturing Unity metadata, assembly linkage, and scene provenance when available.

pathId.description: Unity m_PathID for the MonoScript asset.

className.description: Short class name recorded on the MonoScript.

fullName.description: Fully qualified type name derived from namespace and class name.

executionOrder.description: Execution order recorded on the MonoScript importer.

scriptGuid.description: Unity GUID derived from the MonoScript content hash.

assemblyGuid.description: Unity GUID derived from the assembly name.

scriptFileId.description: MonoScript file identifier as computed by Unity hashing.

propertiesHash.description: Lowercase hex representation of MonoScript m_PropertiesHash.

name.description: Scene name when the script is sourced from a scene collection.

path.description: Project-relative path of the source scene.

guid.description: GUID recorded for the source scene asset.
